column5: Hi there! You'll enjoy staying at my apartment! Located right by 59/69 freeway and also near the loop on to 610, it's easy to get around! You're only 7 minutes away from Houston's main shopping destination (The Houston Galleria), 10 minutes from West University, 12 minutes from midtown, and 15 minutes from NRG stadium and downtown! It's a cozy stay for anyone!
